# Task Manager CLI

## Usage

- `add <title> --data <path>`: Add a new task.
- `list --data <path>`: List all tasks.
- `done <id> --data <path>`: Mark a task as done.
- `remove <id> --data <path>`: Remove a task.

notes: This project implements a simple task manager CLI using TypeScript and Node.js built-in modules. It includes a TaskStore class for managing tasks and a CLI script for interacting with the store.
